name: PowerCenter:Avoid too many Transformations per mapping
description:
Mapping should have less than X Transformations.
The X threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will
output:
This report lists all Mappings and Mapplets having more than X Tranformations.
It provides the following information:
Mapping or Mapplet full name, number of Transformation
rationale: For understandability and maintainability, Mapping shouldn't have too many Transformations.
remediation: Review the Mapping design to reduce the number of objects and try to use Mapplets whenever possible.
total: Total number of Mappings and Mapplets
